message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $200. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your offer, but I can't go below $180. This product is really in high demand, and I'm confident it's worth this price.
I'm still interested in the product, but I really can't go above $150. Can you meet me in the middle?
